boardgame.name: Hardball 4: MLBPA Players Disk
boardgame.description:
Who's on the line-up card tonight?

You've got the players--over 700 from all 28 major league teams. You've got the stats--average against righties and lefties, wild pitches and more. With the HardBall4TM MLBPA Players Disk, you've got real Big League ball, down to Al Michaels calling each player by name.

- excerpt from the back of the box

boardgame.name: Danger in the Air
boardgame.description:
FRPGD Blurb

A huge creature drifts in the air above the homes of the village, a structure visible within its great body and the glitter of gold sparkling inside. What other treasures—and terrors—might this visitor from elsewhere possess?
boardgame.rpg: Dungeon Crawl Classics Role Playing Game

boardgame.name: The Three-Wizard Conundrum
boardgame.description:
FRPGD Blurb

Word is 3 mighty wizards are looking for a band to retrieve a fabled ring of wizardry. Whichever wizard you choose, your trek leads to a place where magic almost died, and the mountain holds surprises not even the wizards are aware of...

boardgame.name: The Zorro Dice Game: Dice Cup
boardgame.description: This is a dice cup that was available on The Zorro Dice Game Kickstarter campaign.

boardgame.name: The Zorro Dice Game: Rolling Mat
boardgame.description: This is a mat you can roll dice into that was available on The Zorro Dice Game Kickstarter campaign.

boardgame.name: The Zorro Dice Game: Metal Zorro Dice
boardgame.description: These are 6 heavy metal dice available on The Zorro Dice Game Kickstarter campaign that replace the smaller acrylic dice in the base game.

boardgame.name: The Zorro Dice Game: Metal Hero Dice
boardgame.description: These are 8 heavy metal dice available on The Zorro Dice Game Kickstarter campaign that replace the smaller acrylic hero dice in the base game.

boardgame.name: The Zorro Dice Game: Metal Ally Dice
boardgame.description: These are 8 heavy metal dice available on The Zorro Dice Game Kickstarter campaign that replace the smaller acrylic hero dice in the Stunts and Allies expansion.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: The Zorro Dice Game: Stunts and Allies

boardgame.name: The Zorro Dice Game: Equipment Pack #2
boardgame.description:
This has 6 Common Equipment and 2 Premium Equipment. It contains:
Bandana
Bolos
Charm
Gauntlets
Goat
Pitchfork
Amulet
Chalice

It was released with the Stunts and Allies expansion Kickstarter campaign but it works with any combination of base game or expansions.

boardgame.name: The Zorro Dice Game: Ally Pack #1
boardgame.description:
This has 4 Allies for use with Stunts and Allies expansion to The Zorro Dice Game. It contains:
Ana Maria Verdugo
Zorro's Fighting Legion
Joaquin Murrieta
Jose of the Cocopahs
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: The Zorro Dice Game: Stunts and Allies

boardgame.name: The Zorro Dice Game: Big Box
boardgame.description: This is a box that organizes all expansions, promos, and accessories from The Zorro Dice Game. It was released with the Stunts and Allies expansion Kickstarter campaign.

boardgame.name: Sakura Succubus
boardgame.description:
User Summary

The Tokyo based photographer Ogasawara Hiroki one day is tasked to do a photo shoot of one of Japan's top idols, Ikue Ayu - and one thing leads to another, with Hiroki suddenly fining himself at the mercy of three beautiful celebrities; Ayu, Marina - a sultry businesswoman and Cosmos, social media star known for provocative dresses and lewd photos.

One day he finds out that they are all succubi - and they find his scent intoxicating; They simply can't get enough of Hiroki!

boardgame.name: Sakura Succubus 2
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Sakura Succubus 2 picks up where Sakura Succubus ended - but Hiroki don't have only to juggle his job - and the three succubi, because along the way turns up two other prominent succubi celebrities; the actress Hifumi and the tennis star Hazel are now entering his life.

boardgame.name: Aquatica: e-Raptor Insert
boardgame.description:
-Raptor Insert UV Print compatible with Aquatica + Cold Waters is your must-have accessory designed to organize and improve the experience of the gameplay.

Thanks to our insert you can arrange all game components and sleeved cards to keep them in order – no more mess on the table while playing. No more looking for necessary elements during the game.

Moreover, when the box is closed, the components are still kept in order, ready for setting another game faster than ever!

The insert is durable and made of high-quality HDF. To assemble it, there is no glue required. It allows you to hold all components inside the box.

Fits into the box with dimensions: 29.7 x 29.7 x 7.1 cm

boardgame.name: Sakura Succubus 3
boardgame.description:
User Summary

While living the great life with his five succubi girlfriends, Hiroki finds his future a nice and rosy one until he is encountered by a woman named Yue.

According to Yue, she is the Succubus Queen and they share a deep bond, thus she wants to take Hiroki to the Succubus realm where she can have him all for herself...

boardgame.name: Sakura Succubus 4
boardgame.description:
User Summary

After managing to escape the clutches of Yue's plan to bring him to the succubus world, Hiroki really needs to relax. Therefore Ayu invites him to spend the summer at her private Okinawa beach house, where he and the six succubi can have fun and games all summer long.

boardgame.name: Sakura Succubus 5
Sakura Succubus V
boardgame.description:
User Summary

When Hifumi is invited to a small European country called Astoria by the country's princess, her royal highness Stephania Sofia Maria Isabella, she goes there - together with Hiroki, and suddenly it turns out that Marina and Hazel is tagging along.

In Astoria, Hiroki befriends princess Stephania and her maid Elizabeth - but something is off with Elizabeth, which Marina immediately is noticing...

boardgame.name: Galaxy Girls - Erica Alone in Deep Space
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Follow Erica as she is tasked with a mission from High Command to investigate a strange nebula spotted near the ship on it's sensors.

boardgame.name: Galaxy Girls - Kotoha's Harem
boardgame.description:
User Summary

A kinetic visual novel about Kotoha following on from the harem style ending of Galaxy Girls to see what happens next.

boardgame.name: Obscure Battles 6: A Cruel Sea
boardgame.description:
In "Obscure Battles Volume 6 – A Cruel Sea", the player takes the role of a Submarine commmander trying to locate and destroy enemy shipping on a patrol.

This is a exclusively solitaire game: you don’t need any other player to play the game. Extremely fast playing and simple but detailed , fun game - just a A3 for your map board, the game is extremely easy to play. Just roll a single D6 and pick the targets then see if you can execute a successful attack and then survive to tell the tale !

Game comes with 8 Submarines: German Type 21 and 7C from WW2 and UC/III from WW1, French Surcouf, Japanese Junsen 2 , US Gato from WW2, Soviet Foxtrot and one special yellow submarine :) .

Play the standart game or you can also design your own missions using the supplied Submarine Info , Target ad Escort Type Cards. There are more Submarine types and loadouts that are provided as part of the optional packs.

Your targets are selected from different decks of cards such as different freighter types, fishing vessel, troop Ships, tankers, capital warships etc.

Your submarine will not be safe out there: there are several usual ASW escorts such as Destroyers, Frigates, ASW Planes, Corvettes and and even Q-Ships.

There is also special set of "named" Target and Escort cards that come with their own name such "HMS Saltash Castle", "USS England" and "IJN Shigure" and more.
Finally, the combat cards give you the expected unexpectedness of the life at sea.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Galaxy Girls - Sara Remembers
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Sara feels the losses and try to come to terms with them as Kotoha helps her connect to the virtual reality machine to aid her moving from her past and finding a new life on the space ship.

boardgame.name: El Túmulo Perdido de Azgoz el Testarudo
boardgame.description:
From Publisher website:

Hace muchos, muchos años, cuando la ciudad de Robleda aún era joven, las tierras más allá de sus murallas eran páramos salvajes y montuosos, ahítos de criaturas terribles y bestias innombrables, que moraban bajo y sobre las colinas, en los tremedales y en las frescas riberas y sotos del Arroyosauce. Fueron muchos los aventureros que recorrieron sus vaguadas y valles, explorando más allá, descubriendo ruinas de otrora y reliquias ignotas. No pocos de ellos perecerían durante sus aventuras, enfrentados a desafíos y cuitas mil. Los menos, aquellos que gozaron de mayor fama, fueron enterrados en las Colinas Azules, horadadas desde hace siglos por cientos de túmulos, cavernas, grutas, pasadizos, criptas y mazmorras de todo tipo. Al trascurrir de los años, estos enterramientos cayeron en el olvido, extraviados en las brumas del tiempo.

Aventura diseñada para un grupo de 4 a 6 jugadores de nivel 1.
boardgame.rpg: Aventuras en la Marca del Este
boardgame.rpgpublisher: Grupo Creativo La Marca del Este

boardgame.name: Las cuevas del Clan Atronador
boardgame.description:
From Publisher website:

El polvo y el silencio fueron los únicos dueños de los viejos salones del Clan Atronador durante siglos. Hasta que un día todo cambió. Una tribu de goblins, comandados por el temible osgo Ragrak, ocupó las cuevas abandonadas atrora poniendo en peligro toda la comarca y las lindes salvajes del pais. Ya es hora de explorar las traicioneras grutas y combatir a los malvados Invasores. ¿Estarán vuestros aventureros a la altura de la gesta?

Aventura diseñada para un grupo de 4 a 5 jugadores de nivel 1-2.
boardgame.rpg: Aventuras en la Marca del Este
boardgame.rpgpublisher: Grupo Creativo La Marca del Este

boardgame.name: El Monasterio del Dragón Dormido
boardgame.description:
From Publisher website:

Corren rumores en el pueblo sobre el viejo monasterio sobre la colina. No son pocos los que afirman que una enorme sierpe roja despertó de su letargo milenario para atacar las vetustas piedras antaño con su letal y poderosa arma de aliento flamígero. Algunos otros aseguran que el Dragón Rojo aún descansa en el oscuro interior de los ruinosos restos el enclave. Quizás todo ello no sean más que habladurías, pero la Marca precisa de valientes aventureros que arrojen luz sobre la historia.

El monasterio del dragón dormido es una aventura para el juego de rol Aventuras en la Marca del Este diseñada para un grupo de 4 a 6 niños que nunca hayan jugado a este juego o algún juego de rol. Esta aventura está pensada más bien para ayudar con la propia experiencia del autor a orientar a un padre o madre que quiera introducir a sus hijos y amigos en este tipo de juegos. Así pues, podrán encontrar diseminadas por el texto un buen montón de notas para el Narrador con sus consejos, derivados de su propia experiencia dirigiendo este módulo. Hasta un máximo de seis aventureros podrían jugar el módulo, siendo aconsejable que no menos de cuatro personajes jueguen el mismo. Sería igualmente aconsejable disponer de varios juegos de dados, y aunque con uno solo bastaría, es más cómodo disponer de una cantidad suficiente. También es casi imprescindible tener en la mesa a mano algunos lápices, gomas de borrar y unos cuantos folios para realizar anotaciones y mapas.

Aventura diseñada para un grupo de 4 a 6 jugadores de nivel 1-2.
boardgame.rpg: Aventuras en la Marca del Este
boardgame.rpgpublisher: Grupo Creativo La Marca del Este

boardgame.name: La Cúpula de Huesos de Ixambel
boardgame.description:
From Publisher website:

Las viejas sagas ungolitas, vetustas como el mismo tiempo, hablan de una terrible batalla entre las fuerzas de Valion y Zamordax que tuvo lugar más allá de las negras cumbres de oriente, en la Tundra de los Ancestros. Pero las consecuencias de aquel fragor de armas y almas aún perduran en la tierra maldita y, su legado, amenaza con inundar los páramos helados de una nueva oscuridad.

Esta aventura ha sido diseñada para un grupo de 4 a 6 jugadores de nivel 8-11. Si el grupo estuviera compuesto solo por cuatro jugadores, se recomienda que estos hayan alcanzado al menos nivel 10. El módulo está planteado como una exploración de espacios abiertos y mazmorras, que llevará a los personajes desde el confort de la Marca del Este hasta la inhóspita desolación de la Tundra de los Ancestros. Los jugadores deberán planear un largo viaje y enfrentarse en ocasiones a la carestía de recursos para completar esta gesta. La aventura puede adaptarse sin complicación alguna a cualquier otra ambientación de campaña.

Aventura diseñada para un grupo de 4 a 6 jugadores de nivel 8-11.
boardgame.rpg: Aventuras en la Marca del Este
boardgame.rpgpublisher: Grupo Creativo La Marca del Este

boardgame.name: Das kleine böse Kartenspiel
boardgame.description:
The Little Bad Book gets a companion: The Little Evil Card Game! All the evil monsters and characters from the Little Bad Books have sneaked out of the books and are now up to mischief! Only you can banish them back into the books by defeating the Little Evil Card Game. But be careful: With wild changes of direction, nasty abandonment or the funny evil tasks of the curse cards, the game knows all the evil tricks to make it as hard as possible for you!

—description from the publisher (translated)

Das kleine Böse Buch bekommt einen Mitstreiter: Das kleine Böse Kartenspiel! Alle bösen Monster und Figuren aus den kleinen Bösen Büchern haben sich aus den Büchern geschlichen und treiben nun ihr Unwesen! Nur du kannst sie wieder zurück in die Bücher bannen, in dem du das kleine Böse Kartenspiel besiegst. Aber Vorsicht: Mit wilden Richtungswechseln, fiesem Aussetzen oder den lustig-bösen Aufgaben der Fluchkarten kennt das Spiel alle bösen Tricks, um es dir so schwer wie möglich zu machen!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Roll for Valor
boardgame.description:
Roll for Valor is a competitive roll and write set in a fantasy world where the Dwarven Vergar Empire seeks to subdue all other free people. Recruit and muster your volunteer units of elves, orcs, free dwarves, ciar, and humans. You will gain bonuses and unlock ballista and dragons to protect yourselves and your gold. The player with the largest army at the end of 15 days wins. Players roll a pool of dice, earn extra dice, and might even unlock bonuses on 20 sided dice while recording their recruitment. Dragons are powerful allies, but be careful as they may devour the gold you need to muster your forces.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: En Compañía de Cuervos
boardgame.description:
From Publisher website:

Aquí hablaremos sobre una raza singular, mitad hombre mitad cuervo. Se trata de los kenku. Este suplemento habla de esta raza y de sus posibilidades con aliado o antagonista.

Criaturas astutas y esquivas por naturaleza, los Kenku pueden llegar a convertirse en enemigos peligrosos o compañeros formidables. En este libro encontrarás una detallada descripción de los mismos, sus estadísticas como criatura, perfil de aventurero, su asentamiento principal en Valion, otras localizaciones de interés y varias sorpresas más para que puedas añadir algo de color a tus aventuras utilizando a estos emplumados personajes.
boardgame.rpg: Aventuras en la Marca del Este
boardgame.rpgpublisher: Grupo Creativo La Marca del Este

boardgame.name: No profanarás el sueño de los muertos
boardgame.description:
From Publisher website:

El Circo de los Magníficos ha llegado a la populosa ciudad de Morowen, la capital de Mourntall, durante la semana de su carnaval, el mayor espectáculo popular de Vermigor. No tardarán en producirse toda suerte de extraños y macabros sucesos en las calles de la abarrotada urbe, mientras nuestros aventureros tratan de desentrañar los misterios tras la siniestra troupe circense. Algo terrible esta a punto de suceder...

Otro módulo ambientado en Vermigor, donde se pondrán de manifiesto tramas ocultas, misterios y tiradas para que los Ajs no acaben locos… Sin duda una aventura muy interesante que deleitará a los amantes de la intriga y la investigación.

Aventura para 3-5 personajes de nivel 6-8.
boardgame.rpg: Aventuras en la Marca del Este
boardgame.rpgpublisher: Grupo Creativo La Marca del Este

boardgame.name: Manual de Psiónica
boardgame.description:
From Publisher website:

Ampliación de reglas para incorporar a tus partidas habilidades y poderes Psiónicos.

El presente suplemento está diseñado específicamente para introducir la energía psiónica en el mundo de Aventuras en la Marca del Este, presentando un conjunto de reglas sencillas y adaptables que nos permitirán añadir una nueva faceta a nuestras campañas y aventuras, aportando color, detalle y variedad.
boardgame.rpg: Aventuras en la Marca del Este
boardgame.rpgpublisher: Grupo Creativo La Marca del Este

boardgame.name: Miedo a la oscuridad
boardgame.description:
From Publisher website:

Un rescate afortunado lleva a los pjs a introducirse en una historia donde se ven involucradas la ambición, la traición y oscuros poderes mágicos.

Miedo a la oscuridad es quizás el primer módulo para el juego Vermigor, es una aventura sencilla y lineal, con bastante humor negro, que pretende ser un homenaje a los clásicos de terror. El objetivo es sumergir a los personajes durante unas horas en una aventura llena de peligros de ultratumba.
boardgame.rpg: Aventuras en la Marca del Este

boardgame.name: El Páramo
boardgame.description:
From Publisher website:

Una entretenida aventura que casi podrían considerarse una suma de varias en las que los aventureros tendrán que ir correteando de un lado a otro resolviendo las diferentes misiones impuestas.

El Páramo es una aventura basada en varias localizaciones. Nuestros aventureros tendrán que desplazarse por los campos y páramos cercanos a Robleda, internándose incluso en los peligrosos cenagales del Gran Pantano. Más tarde, si todo va bien y consiguen sobrevivir a los peligros del camino, podrán visitar la pequeña villa de Alameda, dar una vuelta por el fuerte empalizado de Rocagarganta e incluso llegar más allá, hasta el misterioso túmulo que aguarda en el páramo.
boardgame.rpg: Aventuras en la Marca del Este

boardgame.name: Dziki futbol
boardgame.description:
African animals gather on the savannah to watch the Wildlife League final. Who will be the winner? The Brave Lions or the Charging Rhinos?

Players lead their teams to victory in the final game. To win the trophy, a team must win 2 games.

Players shuffle the Action cards and the Referee cards to create two decks of face down cards.

The Ball marker will move from player to player during the game, depending on how the game goes. The Action card is always revealed by the player who is in possession of the ball.
The player with the ball reveals the first card from the Action card pile and considers its effect.

After the Action card or the Referee card has been drawn, each player's active player cards are discarded into the discard pile.
A player takes a shot at the goal when a Shot Action card is revealed or it results from the contents of other Action cards.
If a Referee card is drawn players consider a card from the Referee card pile e.g. penalty kick, free kick, injury.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Afrykańskie zwierzęta gromadzą się na sawannie, aby zobaczyć finał Ligi Dzikich Zwierząt. Kto zostanie zwycięzcą? Odważne Lwy czy Szarżujące Nosorożce?

Gracze prowadzą swoje drużyny do zwycięstwa w finałowym meczu. Aby zdobyć puchar, drużyna musi wygrać 2 mecze.
Gracze tasują karty Akcji i karty Sędziego, tworząc dwie talie zakrytych kart.
Znacznik Piłki w trakcie gry będzie przechodził z jednego gracza do drugiego, w zależności od przebiegu gry. Kartę Akcji zawsze odkrywa gracz, który jest w posiadaniu piłki.
Gracz przy piłce odkrywa ze stosu kart Akcji pierwszą kartę i rozpatruje jej efekt.
Po wykonaniu akcji z karty Akcji lub karty Sędziego, karty aktywnych zawodników każdego gracza zostają odrzucone na stos kart wykorzystanych.
Gracz oddaje strzał na bramkę w momencie, gdy zostanie odsłonięta karta Akcji albo wynika on z treści innych kart.
Jeśli wylosowana zostanie karta Sędziego gracze rozpatrują kartę ze stosu kart Sędziego np. rzut karny, rzut wolny, kontuzja.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Shareware Souls
boardgame.description:
Maxwell DeHavelock ve a su hija andando por la calle desde la ventana de su edificio, pero es algo imposible porque su hija está muerta. Trata de alcanzarla en la calle, pero al no conseguirlo contrata a unos detectives, los PJ, para que descubran qué ha pasado.

La partida tiene lugar durante el año 2043. La mayor parte del mundo es inhabitable debido al cambio climático, y la parte habitable está dominada por corporaciones empresariales de corte neo-feudal.

Las aventuras son un homenaje a los comics de Nathan Never, que son una fuente de inspiración muy buena para partidas de Hardboiled que tengan lugar en el futuro, así como varios clásicos del cine negro.
boardgame.rpgpublisher: Grupo Creativo La Marca del Este

boardgame.name: El lago que flotaba sobre la Tierra
boardgame.description:
Los investigadores, los PJ, son contratados para investigar un asesinato en un entorno cerrado (y en órbita). El asesino y las posibles futuras víctimas están todos en el mismo lugar...

La partida tiene lugar durante el año 2043. La mayor parte del mundo es inhabitable debido al cambio climático, y la parte habitable está dominada por corporaciones empresariales de corte neo-feudal.

Las aventuras son un homenaje a los comics de Nathan Never, que son una fuente de inspiración muy buena para partidas de Hardboiled que tengan lugar en el futuro, así como varios clásicos del cine negro.
boardgame.rpgpublisher: Grupo Creativo La Marca del Este

boardgame.name: Bajo cero
boardgame.description:
En una instalación minera del polo norte ha aparecido una droga ilegal. Los investigadores son contratados para descubrir quién la ha llevado hasta allí.

La partida tiene lugar durante el año 2043. La mayor parte del mundo es inhabitable debido al cambio climático, y la parte habitable está dominada por corporaciones empresariales de corte neo-feudal.

Las aventuras son un homenaje a los comics de Nathan Never, que son una fuente de inspiración muy buena para partidas de Hardboiled que tengan lugar en el futuro, así como varios clásicos del cine negro.
boardgame.rpgpublisher: Grupo Creativo La Marca del Este

boardgame.name: Vermigor
boardgame.description:
From the book's preface:

Vermigor es un juego de fantasía, porque en Vermigor hay magia, elfos, enanos, dragones y otras criaturas mitológicas. No son fruto de la imaginación, son reales y parte del día a día común. Es un juego de terror, porque se suceden eventos y misterios sobrenaturales y espeluznantes, donde a menudo intervienen personajes y monstruos perversos guiados por emociones primarias y poderosas. Y es un juego romántico oscuro por su atmósfera melancólica y cruel, salpicada de brotes de locura y plagada por fantasmas y seres grotescos.

Vermigor es un juego completo con todo lo necesario para empezar a jugar inmediatamente. Incluye todas las reglas necesarias en una revisión completa del reglamento de Aventuras en la Marca del Este, ambientación, bestiario, conjuros y una aventura introductoria llena de misterio y horrores.

boardgame.name: Snap Ships Tactics
boardgame.description:
Snap Ships Tactics is a revolutionary miniatures battle game you play with modular, fully customizable ship models.

In the future, humanity is under constant attack from a brutal alien hive mind known as The Komplex. Facing them are the pilots of the Forge: commanders of spacecraft known as Snap Ships. Fast attack craft, interceptors, armored bombers, dropships, and support craft - Snap Ships are constructed from modular components allowing ships to be outfitted on-the-fly for the specific mission at hand.

In Snap Ships Tactics, each player builds a custom miniature ship (or a squadron of them) and commands them in intense tactical combat over a series of rounds. Ships are completely modular and built from a library of hundreds of unique plastic components. Ships maneuver across a freeform battlefield, as players allocate power to their ship's unique systems to move, evade, and fire many different weapons. They can take advantage of battlefield hazards and terrain to gain the upper hand and seek to destroy the ships in their opponent’s squadron.

Game Features:

BUILD a ship from scratch and equip it to fit your play style
DETAILED miniatures using the quick-to-build yet high fidelity Snap Ships system
BATTLE across a configurable play space using an innovative movement system
HUNDREDS of components to choose from across multiple ship and unit sizes
VS, CO-OP and SOLO modes with a card driven AI system that lets you dogfight against the game


Snap Ships Tactics: because the best ship is the one you create!

—decription from the designer

boardgame.name: Yoncollon Duel
boardgame.description:
Yonocollon Die are specialized dice with four faces. While each die has a primitive shape, when combined they form a fun, innovative and flexible game play system. Players can cast two dice which allows them to move their player token(s) in a variety of ways.

In order to expand the usage of this new dice form I invented a short, repeatable and fun game. The game I created is a 1x5 spaces game called "Yoncollon Duel".

The goal of the game is to be first to move your three pieces from your side to the opposite side.

Players : 2
Board : 1x5 board
Pieces : Players have 3 pieces each.
Bet chips : Players have 5 discs each.
Dice : a pair of classic speed dice and modern speed dice. Players decide which dice edition to use before the game.
Game goal : Be the first player to move your three pieces from your side to the opposite side.
Decide first player and then alternate turns. Players cast two dice then move their piece(s) by the moving rule below at their turn.

A: Move one piece with sum of dice pip(s).
B : Move two pieces according to each die pip(s). Players can decide their first move pip(s).
Pieces must land on open spaces jumping other pieces on the board and must reach the opposite side exactly. If player has no legal place to move at his turn, then he loses the game. If players have only one piece, moving a piece by either one of dice pips is considered a legal move.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Batman: Gotham City Chronicles – Poison Ivy (New 52)
boardgame.description:
With this new profile, Poison Ivy has developed her toxin’s power to its ultimate level, and is now capable of dealing a mortal blow to those foolish enough to get up close and personal.

This iteration of Ivy is more prone to melee attack damage than her previous corebox iteration, but she has some new heavy protection, who will ensure that she only suffers what they cannot take on her behalf. Keeping her protected is our recommendation.

Poison Ivy (New 52) can be played, with the Carnivorous Plants Rex in Versus mode.

She also can be played, with the corebox’s Carnivorous Plants in Adventure Mode’s missions:


Plants Invasion
Jungle Madness (Wayne Manor expansion)
Every mission from the Suicide Squad expansion’s campaign (Crocodile Day and the others), where she can be accompanied by her Carnivorous Plants OR her Carnivorous Plants Rex.


—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Batman: Gotham City Chronicles – Batman (New 52) and Rookie
boardgame.description:
For a time, a government program saw commissioner Gordon donning the mantle of Gotham City’s protector. But he wasn’t alone; he was accompanied by a huge robot affectionately named « Rookie ».

Surgical muscle implantation and intense training augmented his fighting ability and agility, allowing him to face his fears and push beyond his prior limits. And his detective skills, honed over the years as Police Commissioner, were as sharp as ever.

His moral compass, unchanged, still guided him towards the pursuit of justice. The government tech allowed Rookie to be at his side, under his guidance, providing mission support.

In gameplay terms, Gordon controls Rookie using his Command skill, but instead of GCPD officers it’s a super heavy Bat-suit Bot striking fear into Gotham’s’ criminal underworld.

Batman (New 52) and Rookie are both playable in Versus mode. Batman (New 52) (with Rookie’s tile) can be substituted in the following corebox Adventure Mode Missions: "Deadly Infection" and "Good Cops / Bad Cops".

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Eating Vegans
boardgame.description:
In this highly strategic game entice a free range vegan to graze, plump them up, and eat them before you’re attacked. Steal vegans, cropdust neighboring ranges, and try avoiding the allure of bacon or bunnies eating what’s rightfully theirs.

This 100 card deck is packed with fun. This game is for 2-6 players and suitable for ages 8 and over. Games usually last between 15 and 30 minutes. This game is based on the Trophic levels and pokes jest at the fact vegans have voluntarily lowered themselves on the food chain. In the game vegans are free range. You utilize crop cards to entice them to graze before plumping them up to ultimately harvest them for consumption.

Plant a Crop card in Your Range (players personal play area) and entice a Vegan (Male, Female, or Non-Binary) from the Free Range (face down Vegan pile) to graze. Feed a Vegan 3 Crops and they are ready to harvest. Eat your Vegan and place them in your Belly (area adjacent to Your Range). First player to eat 3 Meals wins the game.

Players may also generate Meals by utilizing a Breed card with a Male and Female Vegan, creating a Baby Vegan. You may harvest 2 Baby Vegans in Your Range as a Meal or use a Vegan Snack card with a Baby Vegan as a Meal.

Players obstruct each other's ability to harvest Vegans with Action Cards. Some action cards have attack elements, others defense / block elements, and some both.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Batman: Gotham City Chronicles – Prof. Pyg's Gang
boardgame.description:
These freaks created by the insane Professor Pyg have two different profiles on the same double tile.

Horse Head and Bull Head are big and tough and have a nigh impenetrable defense. Their attacks are dreadful, especially when you know their weapon’s length. These creatures may perform complex manipulations, even if they are not particularly gifted at doing so.

Rooster Head and Goat Head are puny, but harder to hit. They are not as fearsome as their companions, but if you let them slip out of your sight, they’ll be behind your back in a second. Be careful of their rapid strikes, as they may injure you badly. They are capable of complex thoughts, but aren’t better than the other two with manipulations.

On top of that, their frightening look gives them significant menace. Anybody trying to sneak up close on them is instantly repelled.

Prof.Pyg is not required to be your villain in order to use the Prof. Pyg’s Gang tile. They are separate from their creator.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Batman: Gotham City Chronicles – KGBeast
boardgame.description:
During the time of the Soviet Union, Anatoly Knyazev became the KGB’s most ruthless assassin. His ferocity and extreme methods earned him the codename ‘The Beast’. Even after the collapse of the USSR, he remained nostalgic and committed to the ideals of the Soviet era. As a mercenary, he still favored political targets, including the President of the USA. When a contract brought him to Gotham City, he caught the attention of Batman and the two formidable warriors clashed in a series of brutal fights. Though Batman eventually defeated the mercenary, he earned himself a sworn enemy.

A former KGB agent and seasoned mercenary, this efficient killing machine is highly skilled and has mastered hand to hand combat and the art of the killshot, which is reflected in his awesome action bonuses.

He has remembered everything he learnt while following his wartorn path, especially anything explosives related.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Batman: Gotham City Chronicles – The Architect
boardgame.description:
The Architect made a name for himself by launching attacks on Gotham City and targeting the Wayne, Cobblepot, Kane, and Elliot families. These bloodlines are responsible for the construction of Gotham City. But so, too, were the Gates, and beneath the Architect’s mask hides Zachary Gate, heir to the Gate family. His aim is to stand victorious over these age-old blood feuds. By combining his expertise in demolition with his detailed knowledge of the city, he is able to locate and target weak points and hideouts. He is also a dangerous hand-to-hand combatant thanks to his costume that grants him Herculean strength.

Vengeance for the persecution of his notable forefathers drives this villains’ destructive goals.

Wearing the suit his grandfather created affords him tremendous fortitude as he plans massive swathes of destruction throughout the city thanks to his extensive knowledge of explosives.

It also allows him to create pathways through the city – where there were none before.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Batman: Gotham City Chronicles – Nobody
boardgame.description:
Bruce Wayne is Nobody’s nemesis.

This assassin’s camouflage armor provides good protection, but its stealth abilities allows Nobody to simply fade out of his enemy’s sight and then strike that fatal blow.

Killing close up or at a distance is an easy task for this martial arts master and moving at heights is a breeze due to his superb agility.

Nobody can be used in the corebox Adventure Mode mission "Like Father, Like Daughter" and is fully recruit able in Versus Mode missions.

boardgame.name: Batman: Gotham City Chronicles – The Great White Shark
boardgame.description:
Warren White was a notorious trader on the Gotham Stock Exchange. His ruthless methods garnered him the nickname "The Great White Shark". When his embezzlements landed him in court, White pleaded insanity and was sent to Arkham Asylum. There, he was tortured and abused by fellow inmates, and by the time he was released he bore severe physical and psychological scars. With stark white skin and a pair of "gills" (thanks to Killer Croc), his physical appearance now befit his nickname. As just another freak in the criminal underworld, he chose to carve a niche for himself by ousting the Penguin and working with Black Mask.

Warren White doesn’t regret his mishap in Mr Freeze’s cell; his physical and mental transformation elevated him to criminal Kingpin status.

His strategic and tactical leadership lets him position his men exactly where they are needed.

His direct support is more often than not required in order to achieve his goals.

Physical strength not being his key strength, he prefers to lurk in the background until the moment presents itself to deliver that fatal blow.

The Great White Shark is recruitable in Versus mode and can be substituted in the following core box Adventure Mode Mission: "Good Cops/Bad Cops".

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Batman: Gotham City Chronicles – Ghost Dragons
boardgame.description:
Shen Fang’s elite assassins are fearsome melee opponents, masters of the martial arts and ready to pounce at a moment’s notice.

Flame skill greatly increases their havoc potential, but watch out, those flames can affect everyone, not just their opponents.

These fiery dragons are swappable with elite characters in the following core box Adventure Mode missions: "To Sink a City", "Suicide Escape", and "Like Father Like Daughter".

They are also fully recruitable in Versus Mode.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Trampoline Park
boardgame.description:
Trampoline Park is played over several rounds. At the beginning of each round, the top playing tokens from the piles go to the jumping points placed around the game board. The youngest player starts the game, then players take turns in clockwise order.

From the jumping point, a playing token moves based on how much energy the player puts into the jump. After a token jumps to a tile, it applies a force to the tile (as on a trampoline) and flings any tokens on that tile to adjacent tiles. Then the referee token goes to the next jumping point in clockwise order, and the top playing tokens again go to the jumping points and players take their turns in order again. If a playing token remains at a jumping point, the new token is placed behind the previous one to create an entrance line.

As soon as a player obtains three tiles of the same colors or the same name, he/she reveal his/her card and win. Since you don't know the other players' colors, you might do something which accidentally helps another player win, so jump with care!

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: The Cinderella Game
boardgame.description:
Find a a coachman, a crown, and a glass slipper... and win your dream prince for life.

—description from the back of the box

The Cinderella Game is designed with young children in mind. The game comes with a unique two-part game board that lets players create their own adventures. Children will be captivated by the detailed illustration and innovative game play."

boardgame.name: Lootsville
boardgame.description:
Lootsville is a strategy game where you roll dice to take all your opponent's loot by moving them around the streets on the board. You first hide your loot in any area of town on the 4 pointed star spots on the board. Place you team on the starts spots and begin play. Be the first to return all you opponent’s gemstones to your base. Your team is one Officer and two Bandits. Work them together to take your opponent's gemstones before they can take all of yours. Guard your part of town while your Bandits loot other parts. If your bandits get caught and get locked up, use your Officer to let them free. The Officer is the only one who have the keys to the jails on your corner of town.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Galaxy Girls - Emilia Sneaks Aboard
boardgame.description:
User Summary

The story about Emilia who sneaks aboard the Starlight. The story works as a prequel to Galaxy Girls.

boardgame.name: Princess Wands
boardgame.description:
Cooperative Story Game about the Adventures of Alina, Mckenzlie, Hanna and Starry as they take on Dragonthorn and make games with their wands. Learn how they influence the dragon to give up his gold and give him a new name. Move your character portraits around the board as you read the story. The character portraits go to the locations on the game board to match the scenes in the book. Once you have mastered the lore and learned how the wands work, use the playing cards to play out the CARD GAME! Matching the characters on the cards you force other players to draw cards based on how many characters you match! If you put the wands together you win the game!

—description from the designer

listing.notes: Cooperative STORY GAME is about the adventures of Alina, Mackenzlie, Hanna and Starry as they take on Dragonthorn and make games with their wands to find out way more than they expected. Learn how they influence the dragon to give up his gold and give him a new name. Move your character portraits around the board as you read the story. The character portraits go to the locations on the game board to match the scenes in the book. Once you have mastered the lore and learned how the wands work, use the playing cards to play out the CARD GAME! Matching the characters on the cards, you force other players to draw cards based on how many characters you match! If you put the wands together, you win the game!

boardgame.name: Galaxy Girls - Poker Night
boardgame.description:
User Summary

This DLC adds a strip poker gameplay to Galaxy Girls with Erica, Kotoha, Sara and Emilia getting together for a weekly poker game

The DLC has the following features:
Risque Strip Poker Gameplay
Fun mini story introducing the Setting.
Brief Chibi Introduction
Full poker mechanics - Ante, Card Exchange, Betting.
Call, Raise, Fold and go ALL-IN
Five Card Poker Gameplay

Win against all the other girls - and get them out of their clothes!

boardgame.name: Treasure Monsters
boardgame.description:
Treasure Monsters is a turn based strategy game where you need to find all your opponent's hidden bags of treasure with pawns that you move to occupy a square on the board. Be the first to return them to your base and win the game! You need to dig through the pile of buff tiles in the middle row of the board to create a way to get to the other side. You use one of your Diggerdo pawns to turn over tiles on your opponent’s side of the game board, digging up treasure in a square. Once you successfully find all 5 bags of treasure in your opponent’s base and use your Gobbler pawn to bring them back to your base, you win the game!

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Total War: Three Kingdoms – Yellow Turban Rebellion
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Play as the Yellow Turban Rebellion sub-culture with three new playable Warlords; He Yi, Gong Du, and Huang Shao and three new hero classes: Healer, Scholar, and Veteran as well as new character skills, weapons and armour for them.

boardgame.name: Coin Master
boardgame.description: Freemium mobile game

boardgame.name: With Those We Love Alive
boardgame.description:
With Those We Love Alive is weirdfem dark fantasy where you design artifacts for a skull empress. It was made in Twine. Sometimes you draw on yourself with marker.

Source: The Game Website.

(The game is free and browser based, accessible in the link above)

boardgame.name: Arkham Horror: The Card Game (Revised edition) – The GiftForge Insert
boardgame.description:
Tested with premium sleeved cards.
This product does not require assembly.

The package includes 10 pcs of card dividers.
Insert size: 27,9 cm x 24 cm x 7 cm.
The product won't lift the lid.
Material: 3 mm birch wood.

boardgame.name: Arkham Horror: The Card Game expansions (Revised edition) – The GiftForge Insert
boardgame.description:
Tested with premium sleeved cards.
This product does not require assembly.

The package includes 10 pcs of card dividers.
Insert size: 27,9 cm x 24 cm x 7 cm.
The product won't lift the lid.
Material: 3 mm birch wood.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Arkham Horror: The Card Game – Edge of the Earth: Campaign Expansion

boardgame.name: Total War: Three Kingdoms – Eight Princes
boardgame.description:
The Eight Princes Chapter Pack is set 100 years after the events of Total War: THREE KINGDOMS, and features a new cast of playable factions led by the foremost princes of the Jin Dynasty. These Eight Princes offer feature substantially different campaign mechanics, focussing their playstyles in fascinating and unique ways

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Total War: Three Kingdoms – The Furious Wild
boardgame.description:
With the introduction of The Furious Wild Expansion Pack comes the first ever extension of the Total War: Three Kingdom’s map and its already rich cast of characters. Visit the jungles around Southern China and with it, the fearsome tribes of the Nanman. Will you unite the tribes of the south?

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Sagarmatha
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Sagarmatha es una aventura para el reglamento genérico Ysystem inspirada en las grandes gestas del himalayismo mundial. La historia desarrolla una trama que combina acción, investigación y relaciones sociales en el Nepal actual y está diseñada para jugarse solo con esta publicación y con todos o al menos la mayoría de los personajes pregenerados que en ella se ofrecen.

Los personajes son miembros del equipo de producción de Más allá del límite, una serie documental especializada en gestas alpinas. Su programa ha perdido audiencia y necesitan culminar alguna ascensión que deje a todo el mundo boquiabierto. Con este propósito vuelan a Katmandú para hincarle el diente ni más ni menos que al Annapurna en diciembre. Por supuesto, las cosas no son nada sencillas, y la trama en la capital de Nepal ofrece un gran giro de tuerca cuando realizan un fenomenal e impactante descubrimiento…

En las páginas de Sagarmatha vas a encontrar:

– Una campaña épica de alpinismo, búsqueda interior y superación personal.

– Seis personajes pregenerados, cada uno con un amplio trasfondo y un talento específico.

– Múltiples ayudas de juego completamente maquetadas para introducir a tus jugadores en la historia.

– Un anexo con todas las reglas de Ysystem que necesitas para jugar, incluyendo algunas reglas específicas para esta campaña.

«Si todo está bajo control, es que estás escalando demasiado lento».

boardgame.name: Total War: Three Kingdoms – Fates Divided
boardgame.description:
Determine the fate of China in the new Chapter pack for Total War: Three Kingdoms. Grow Yuan Shao’s mighty army or stand in his way as Cao Cao and use strategy to achieve the grandest of ambitions.

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: Escuadrón Arcángel
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Escuadrón Arcángel es una historia de acción y espionaje para el reglamento Ysystem ambientada en el pasado reciente y con toques de ciencia ficción.

Como miembros del Escuadrón Arcángel, los jugadores interpretarán a un peculiar grupo de jóvenes entrenados por una misteriosa agencia de inteligencia e insertados luego en «entornos potencialmente hostiles para los intereses norteamericanos» convertidos en los perfectos agentes durmientes. Sin embargo, tras varios operativos clandestinos en los que demostró sobradamente su eficacia, el Escuadrón Arcángel desapareció sin dejar rastro durante una delicada misión en suelo kuwaití.

Hasta que un buen día, casi dos décadas después de haberse esfumado de la faz de la Tierra, alguien vino con… esas imágenes. Borrosas, sí, sacadas de alguna cámara de seguridad de vete a saber dónde, pero eran ellos, no cabía la menor duda. A fin de cuentas, estaban tal y como la última vez que alguien los había visto con vida. No habían envejecido ni un ápice. Era como si para ellos nunca hubiese pasado el tiempo…

En las páginas de Escuadrón Arcángel vas a encontrar:

– Una completísima campaña repleta de acción, adrenalina y dilemas morales, compuesta por tres largas aventuras con sus respectivos interludios, con la que descubrir qué fue de los Arcángeles desaparecidos.

– Cinco personajes pregenerados, los miembros originales del Programa Arcángel, cada uno con un elaborado trasfondo y talentos específicos. ¡Y un sexto personaje opcional!

– Una práctica cronología de los años en los que los Arcángeles permanecieron fuera del mapa, con todos los eventos políticos, económicos y sociales más relevantes.

– Múltiples ayudas de juego completamente maquetadas para introducir a tus jugadores en la historia.

– Un anexo con todas las reglas de Ysystem que necesitas para jugar, incluyendo algunas reglas específicas para esta campaña.

«Ninguna buena acción queda sin su correspondiente castigo».

boardgame.name: Survival of the Fattest
boardgame.description:
Ol’ Grizz slowly opened one sleepy eye and peered out from his den. The snow had all but melted in the warm sunshine and the smell of spring filled the air. The old bear found no joy in the beautiful scene though, he had survived enough winters to know the work that lay ahead. His mind reluctantly turned to thoughts of hunting and hoarding; stashing as much food as possible while the woodland was awake and bountiful.

The bear’s brooding was interrupted by an annoyingly cheerful voice:
“Look Huni, another big juicy berry! This will be our biggest stash yet!”
It was those two ridiculously radiant rabbits, Huni & Bunz. As he watched the little bunnies bounce from bush to bush a cunning plan started to form. Maybe he wouldn’t have to make such an effort this year? After all, there were plenty of other critters already hard at work! Ol’ Grizz pondered this new revelation. If he could apply a little pressure, maybe twist a tail or two, he might just be able to convince his new best friends to share...

In 'Survival of the Fattest', you take the role of a woodland critter and use your unique tricks and abilities to forage for food. Spend your gathered food to complete delicious recipe’s from the Market for in-game bonuses and end-game victory points. After 3 seasons, if you’ve fed your critter and accumulated the most victory points, you shall be declared the winner!

Survival of the Fattest is a visually stunning family-weight game using action selection, hand management and unique critter abilities!

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Army Gals - The Poker Game
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Several months after the Harem Good ending of Army Gals, Raen suggest to get back into the old habit of playing poker - but with your clothes on stake instead of money.

Play a game of strip poker against the three Army Gals in a five card poker gameplay.

This expansion is purchasable separately as well as included in the Deluxe Edition of Army Gals.

boardgame.name: Go To Hell
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Go to Hell es una campaña de terror adulto para Ysystem, que aúna la potencia y la energía que desprende el heavy metal con el horror y la crudeza que habita en lo más profundo del ser humano. Una combinación que converge en una experiencia de juego repleta de acción, terror y violencia no apta para espíritus sensibles.

En esta cruda historia, los jugadores interpretan a los cinco jóvenes miembros de una banda de heavy metal de Los Ángeles que, en el año 1987, inician su carrera hacia el estrellato. La vida no les sonríe a ninguno de ellos, y la música se ha convertido en su única vía de escape. Sin embargo, ciertos acontecimientos van a poner al alcance de sus manos la posibilidad de hacer realidad su gran ambición: convertirse en la banda de rock duro más icónica de todos los tiempos. Pero todo tiene un precio, claro, y el que deberán pagar ellos es aberrantemente alto. ¿Estarán dispuestos a sacrificar sus principios y hasta su propia cordura a cambio de su gran sueño?

En las páginas de Go to Hell vas a encontrar:

– Una campaña repleta de emoción que incorpora objetivos de experiencia e indicaciones de dirección, e incluso escenas adicionales para introducir en la historia a tu elección.

– Cinco personajes pregenerados, cada uno con un amplio trasfondo y un talento específico.

– Múltiples ayudas de juego completamente maquetadas para introducir a tus jugadores en la historia.

– Una sección dedicada a la banda sonora que puedes usar para dirigir Go to Hell.

– Un anexo con todas las reglas de Ysystem que necesitas para jugar, incluyendo algunas reglas específicas para esta campaña.

«¿Quizás todavía quede algo de aquellos jóvenes que un día fuísteis?»

boardgame.name: Relatos Asombrosos. Años 20
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Relatos asombrosos, años 20 es una genial trilogía de aventuras pulp para el reglamento Ysystem ambientadas en la tercera década del siglo XX que hará las delicias de todos aquellos aficionados a las historias repletas de acción, emoción, sorpresa, heroísmo, misterio y, sobre todo, personajes carismáticos e inolvidables. Sus tres escenarios se pueden jugar de forma independiente o, por el contrario, encadenados en una excitante campaña que transcurre en diferentes partes del globo.

"Perdidos en el Mar de China" es una aventura de exploración, terror y acción a raudales cuyo impactante final resulta lo suficientemente abierto como para abrir un sinfín de posibilidades y desarrollos posteriores. Los personajes de los jugadores se ven arrojados a una isla remota en donde descubrirán que no están solos… ni mucho menos. Horrores y misterios que se remontan a eones de antigüedad aguardan a nuestros héroes, así como otros peligros y desafíos mucho más mundanos, pero no por ello menos mortales.

"Fantasmas de Boston" es una aventura de entorno urbano y género entre noir y pulp que transcurre en la capital de Massachusetts. Es un escenario ligeramente sandbox que, si bien puede parecer una aventura clásica de investigación y tintes lovecraftianos, en realidad alberga una trama bastante compleja en la que se imbrican el crimen organizado, la alta sociedad de Nueva Inglaterra, los conflictos sindicales y, por supuesto, lo sobrenatural.

Por úiltimo, "Muerte en Chihuahua" es la aventura más explosiva, lineal y enérgica de toda la trilogía. Diversión pura al 100%, sin ambages, en el convulso México de la Revolución y la espantosa Guerra Cristera, con un tono específico e inconfundible de western crepuscular sazonado con un poco de suspense, un mucho de terror y un todo de ambiente minero.

En las páginas de Relatos asombrosos, años 20 vas a encontrar:

– Tres excitantes y divertidísimas aventuras de género pulp.

– Seis personajes pregenerados por aventura, algunos de ellos recurrentes, cada uno con un amplio trasfondo y un talento específico.

– Ayudas de juego, planos, mapas e ilustraciones excepcionales de PJ y PNJ.

– Un anexo con todas las reglas de Ysystem que necesitas para jugar, incluyendo también ciertas modificaciones para hacerlo en tono pulp.

«No sé cómo calificar esto; desafía cualquier mente racional…».

boardgame.name: Colección Aventura. Corvus Rex / Steel Falcon y los secretos del Tíbet
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Corvus Rex es una aventura de acción y ciencia ficción para el reglamento Ysystem que pondrá a prueba las lealtades de los personajes hacia su colonia y su gobierno.

La tripulación de la Beowulf regresa por fin a Nikara con las bodegas de transporte llenas y deseando un merecido descanso. El último encargo de su principal mecenas los ha tenido arrastrándose por los asteroides más remotos del sistema Delta durante demasiado tiempo, y ya va siendo hora de poder gastarse los créditos en tierra firme.

Sin embargo, en el vecino sistema Ivaldi los «córvidos» han iniciado una sangrienta rebelión que ha puesto contra las cuerdas a la Confederación Galáctica. Su líder, el conocido terrorista Corvus Rex, está en busca y captura por el sabotaje de la fragata Neptune VII y el asesinato de sus más de 9000 tripulantes. Las autoridades están en alerta máxima ante las altas probabilidades de un nuevo atentado. Menos mal que en Nikara nunca ocurren desgracias de ese tipo, ¿verdad?

Steel Falcon y los secretos del Tíbet es una aventura de acción con un marcado tono pulp para el reglamento Ysystem en la que los integrantes del equipo de grabación de las películas de Steel Falcon tendrán la oportunidad de hacer el mejor film de aventuras de la historia… ¡si sobreviven!

Tras desbaratar los planes del malvado profesor Brinkerhoff en el continente africano, Steel Falcon y su bella ayudante, Stacy Crews, ponen rumbo al exótico Tíbet. ¿Qué nueva maldad estará tramando ese degenerado teutón? ¡No se pierdan la nueva entrega de las emocionantes aventuras de Steel Falcon, próximamente en los mejores cines!

Hacer largometrajes de aventuras con un presupuesto limitado es bastante difícil incluso en los años 30. Pero, por una vez, parece que la suerte sonríe al equipo de grabación de las películas de Steel Falcon. Un ricachón suizo ha financiado un viaje al Tíbet a cambio de participar en el nuevo film. ¡Como para rechazar una oferta así! Con esos entornos naturales y un poquito de suerte con los extras que contraten allí, ¡la siguiente película puede ser un auténtico taquillazo! El problema es que el tal ricachón suizo está siendo manipulado por una rama de los nazis obsesionada con las civilizaciones perdidas. Y tienen una teoría bastante descabellada sobre la Atlántida y el mítico reino de Shambala que están deseosos de poner a prueba.

En las páginas de Colección Aventura vas a encontrar:

– Corvus Rex: una frenética aventura de ciencia ficción que llevará a la tripulación de la Beowulf a descubrir lo precaria que es la situación de su planeta. ¿Conseguirán mantener a salvo su colonia frente a los múltiples peligros que la acechan?

– Steel Falcon y los secretos del Tíbet: una emocionante aventura repleta de acción situada en los años 30 que llevará al equipo de grabación de las películas de Steel Falcon a descubrir civilizaciones perdidas, usar tecnología arcana ¡y enfrentarse a los odiosos nazis!

– Seis personajes pregenerados para cada aventura, con un completo trasfondo, talentos específicos ¡e incluso poderes psíquicos!

– Seis emocionantes semillas de aventura para poder continuar la épica historia de acción de la Beowulf o seguir desentrañando los misterios del Tíbet, y convertir estas aventuras en el inicio de una gran campaña.

– Un ágil sistema de combates espaciales para resolver cualquier enfrentamiento contra piratas del espacio, intrépidos cazarrecompensas aéreos o las imponentes fragatas de la aviesa Confederación Galáctica.

– Un anexo con todas las reglas de Ysystem que necesitas para jugar.

«¡La aventura no ha hecho más que empezar, Stacy!»

boardgame.name: A traveler's photo album
某旅行者的偷拍相册
boardgame.description:
User Summary

As a traveler strayed into a castle owned by a candid expert, and explore it to find the photos scattered to fill the photo album that you found there.

There are 12 rooms and 12 comics to explore and solve.

boardgame.name: fRáGil
boardgame.description:
User Summary:

Recuerdo bien lo que estaba haciendo cuando empezó el apocalipsis: estaba durmiendo, lo cual es un comienzo bastante anodino, pero en realidad medio mundo debía estar haciendo lo mismo que yo. Los que dicen haber visto una aurora o algo así… viven un falso recuerdo, una fantasía compartida.

Pero un día te levantas para trabajar en tu vida normal… y no funciona nada. Crees que es un apagón o algo así… pero ni siquiera sale agua del grifo. Esto es porque los grupos de presión cayeron con todo lo que funcionara con electricidad, dicen que eso es un EMP o una llamarada solar. La verdad es que da igual como lo llames, la verdad es que es bien jodido.

Todo es frágil.

Frágil utiliza una simplificación del sistema STEN, el Sistema Táctico de Espada Negra. Éste da lugar a vibrantes Aventuras en las que los grupos de personajes no son para nada estables, de manera que, como tras el Apocalipsis, no es necesario que cada jugador aparezca en todas las sesiones. Dentro de esta tendencia, Frágil incorpora también numerosas mecánicas que despiertan una sensación dinámica a la vez que opresiva, como la que permite el cambio de "máster" en cualquier partida.

Frágil es un juego de rol donde la supervivencia es la mejor de las recompensas.
boardgame.rpgdesigner: Hermanos Juramentados de la Espada Negra
boardgame.rpgproducer: Hermanos Juramentados de la Espada Negra

boardgame.name: fRáGil: Pozoamargo (Guía del Superviviente)
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

fRáGil: Pozoamargo (Guía del Superviviente) es un suplemento del juego de rol Fragil que nos presenta detalles de la ambientación del juego y, en concreto, de la ciudad de Pozoamargo; un lugar al que nadie querría ir, pero en el que acaba todo el mundo porque todo lo demás es mucho peor.

El suplemento de fRáGil: Pozoamargo (Guía del Superviviente) incluye descripciones de bandas de la ciudad, de personajes importantes de la misma, de gente ¿normal? que puedes encontrarte en ella y, naturalmente, sitios que visitar o evitar. Incluye unas reglas de sucesos para la ciudad.
boardgame.rpgdesigner: Hermanos Juramentados de la Espada Negra
boardgame.rpgproducer: Hermanos Juramentados de la Espada Negra

boardgame.name: Puff Town

Digital roll-and-move board game where you play as a catgirl. When you roll you can land on spaces with Monsters (loose your catnip), Amusement (consume catnip), Transportation/Trap (move forward/back a few spaces), Catnip (gain catnip). Get to the finish line before running out of catnip.

A free DLC/patch contain an extra (naked) character.

boardgame.name: Milk Bottle And Monster Girl
boardgame.description:

boardgame.name: La Scamorra
boardgame.description:
An abstract 1vs1 strategy game inspired by chess, roshambo (AKA RockPaperScissors), traditional italian card games and the awesome videogame 'Pawnbarian'.

Game is played on a 5x5 checkerboard and each player has 3 different pieces representing the 3 symbols of Roshambo.
Each player also has a deck of chess cards to play.

Similar to a trump game each player has a 3 cards hand from which, in turn, they play a card. They then proceed to move one of their pieces according to the chess moving scheme represented on the card (if you play a bishop you can move any of your pieces as if it was a bishop).

Pieces are captured the same way you do in chess, but following the roshambo logic (eg: a scissor piece can only capture a paper piece).
After a player has moved he draws another card and the turn passes to his opponent.

Pieces captured can be respawned in game using special cards and every capture is a point.

After 15 turns the game ends and the player with the highest score wins. If a player is able to capture all 3 pieces of his opponent before he is able to respawn any of them the game ends immediately by knockout.

Full rules and manual can be found on the official Scamorra site.

boardgame.name: Cat War
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Because of all the bad things that ducks have been doing, you decide to take revenge on them! With your deadly fists, a bat and a pistol you go on a rampage. Go get them cat!

boardgame.name: Hentai Girls: Contact [18+]
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Puzzle game with hentai girls. Contains nudity.

The game were removed from Steam April 18th 2022 (after 1½ month).

boardgame.name: Raider's Haul: Magic Item Cards
boardgame.description:
This set of 60 beautifully illustrated poker-sized cards is a companion product to the AAW Games book, Into the Wintery Gale: Raider’s Haul.

The Raider's Haul: Magic Item Deck consists of 30 unlabeled Player Cards with space for notes on the back of the cards, and 30 labeled GM Cards with general magic item information located on the back. The set also includes an index card for easy reference between magic item title, card number, and page number in the Into the Wintery Gale: Raider’s Haul book.

- from the publisher's blurb
boardgame.rpgseries: Into the Wintery Gale: A Vikmordere Saga

boardgame.name: Takes & Adders
boardgame.description: Snakes and ladders but using cards rather than dice to move.

boardgame.name: Winter's Roar: Vikmordere Bestiary Monster Deck
boardgame.description:
These cards may accompany and enhance the Winter's Roar: Vikmordere Bestiary compatible with the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game and designed for use in Into the Wintery Gale.

The front of each card features high quality artwork by Mates Laurentiu with a description of the monster and reference page number to the bestiary on the back. There are also player cards with gorgeous artwork on one side and a place for notes on the back so players can record their experiences with these new and alien creatures in preparation for future encounters.

- from the publisher's blurb
boardgame.rpgseries: Into the Wintery Gale: A Vikmordere Saga

boardgame.name: Hypercorps 2099 Adventure Combo
boardgame.description:
A Triple-Shot of Post-Apocalyptic Action!

The Hypercorps 2099 Adventure Combo brings together three astonishing apocalyptic cyberpunk adventures all in one place as a discounted PDF, and in print for the first time!


Thrillville or Killville? is a Pathfinder Roleplaying Game compatible adventure in the world of Hypercorps 2099. The module begins with the operators in the medieval MMORPG of Veranthea Codex: Life & Death where they meet their Mr. Grey, a "level 34 gnome bard" with details on why Digilife© is hiring operators to deal with the problems on the server that hosts their amusement park. The PCs will travel across the Hypernet, break into Thrillville, and ultimately put an end to what troubles the world's most popular digital tourist destination, but at what cost?



Specimens in Centralia is a Pathfinder Roleplaying Game compatible adventure in the world of Hypercorps 2099. The module begins with the operators (the PCs) en route to Centralia's coal mines, the sight of a fire raging since 1962. Within is their quarry, but how they take it down and bring it back to Pittsburgh plays a large role with how much they'll get paid!



A R.I.P.E. Investment: Of all the hypercorporations in the world one of the most unique is R.I.P.E., an organic soap and perfume company. Unbeknownst to most these mages and priests use the business as a cover for acquiring rare and esoteric (but organic!) reagents for their spells without raising suspicion. One of their means to do so is by shipping across the Great Lakes and into the harbor of the wasteland that’s become of Cleveland. The operators are hired either to defend one of R.I.P.E.’s freight trucks and deliver it to a secure location, or take it for a shadowy organization with insidious intent (but much better pay).


All three adventures are ideal for a party of four operators of 3rd-4th level (hyper score 3), it is also suitable for regular PCs of 7th-8th level (though GM's should take careful notice of the planar traits that make the Hypernet what it is). They can be used in conjunction with the Hypercorps 2099 setting or as an adjunct to any near-future dystopian sci-fi or supers setting!

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: Troublez
boardgame.description:
Instead of smashing zombies heedlessly think about collecting them and sorting them into hordes. Your goal is to build the strongest zombie army possible. You need to take some risks in order to win. Don’t be afraid to purposely mess with other players!

In Troublez players flip cards from one huge shared deck and sort zombies into three rows on the table. Every card must follow several placement rules. First, numbers can go only up and second, no two cards of the same color can be next to each other. When you successfully play a card onto the table, you can decide to stop and collect all the cards from a row of your choice, or you can push your luck and flip another card. If you cannot legally play a card, that is a bad luck and you are getting nothing!

The deck consists of zombies in three colors, but cards with special abilities can be also found there. A Net allows you to steal a zombie card from another player. With A Shotgun you can discard some zombies others are holding and if you get An Axe, you must discard a card yourself. You can be clever with your cards, since after a players turn each other player gets to grab a card from the table. Will you leave them something good? Or will you maneuver so only The Axe is waiting there?

To assemble a horde you must turn in a set of cards – four cards of the same number, or five cards of different numbers. At the end whoever has the strongest army wins.

—description from the designer
